title-group.article-title: Unimodular Lattices in Dimensions 14 and 15 over the Eisenstein Integers

abstract.p: All indecomposable unimodular hermitian lattices in dimensions 14 and 15 over the ring of integers in $(\sqrt { - 3} )$ are determined. Precisely one lattice in dimension 14 and two lattices in dimension 15 have minimal norm 3.
